00097 void Tune::parserTag( const Tag * tag ) {
00098 
00099    if( tag->hasChild("item" ))
00100    {
00101       Tag * p_tag1 = tag->findChild("item")->clone();
00102 
00103       id( p_tag1->findAttribute("id") );
00104       
00105       Tag * p_tag = p_tag1->findChild("tune")->clone();
00106       if( !p_tag->children().empty() )
00107       {
00108          if( p_tag->findChild("artist") )
00109             artist( (p_tag->findChild("artist"))->cdata() );
00110          if( p_tag->findChild("length") )
00111             length( stringToShortInt((p_tag->findChild("length"))->cdata()) );
00112          if( p_tag->findChild("rating") )
00113             rating( stringToUnsignedInt((p_tag->findChild("rating"))->cdata()) );
00114          if( p_tag->findChild("source") )
00115             source( (p_tag->findChild("source"))->cdata() );
00116          if( p_tag->findChild("title") )
00117             title( (p_tag->findChild("title"))->cdata() );
00118          if( p_tag->findChild("track") )
00119             track( (p_tag->findChild("track"))->cdata() );
00120          if( p_tag->findChild("uri") )
00121             uri( (p_tag->findChild("uri"))->cdata() );
00122       }
00123    }
00124 }
